description: When using MonkeyPatching to modify the behavior of a function, a RuntimeError occurs when the patch is applied to an object that is not expected to be modified. This can result in unexpected behavior and errors in the program.
code:
def original_function():
    print("This is the original function")

def monkey_patched_function():
    print("This is the patched function")

# Patch the original function
original_function = monkey_patched_function

# This will
